name: Nocturnal Misteries
description:
We are the B.D.E. Studios and this is our entry for the 2019 Spring #ue4jam: Marketplace Takeover!

A 3D Sidescroller where you play as an archer fighting for his life as his enemies get stronger in the night.

We used some of the free monthly content from the MarketPlace (Modular RPG Heroes Polyart, Platformer Starter Pack ) and some other assets were taken from diverse sources online; Target 3D Model and Textures from TurboSquid, Clouds textures taken from google images.

The art content created by the team include:

Three masks that the enemies wore off, the theme song, some animations, the Sky Sphere and its day and night cycle. All the materials were changed. Source code and all the commits during the development can be found here https://github.com/obiwansm/CoinGameJam (commits are mixed in english and brazillian portuguese).

Gameplay Instructions
Hit an arrow to the target at the end of the level.
MOVE - A/D - <-/-> - LeftThumbsitck
ATTACK - LeftClick/E/LeftFaceButton
DODGE - Tap LeftShift/RightShift/RightFaceButton
RUN - Hold LeftShift/RightShift/RightFaceButton
JUMP - SpaceBar/^/BotomFaceButton
